name: Sun and Shrub
description: A tart and citrusy hot weather refresher featuring tequila and Liber and Co's awesome Rhubarb and Ginger Shrub.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce Liber and Co Rhubarb and Ginger Shrub

recipeInstructions.text: Add tequila, shrub, lemon, and St. Germain to cocktail shaker. Fill shaker 2/3 full with ice and shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker begins to frost.
Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass, top with club soda, garnish with lemon wheel, and serve.
